citation.article-title: Reclassification of Arachnia propionica as Propionibacterium propionicus comb. nov.

p.s: Description of Propionibacterium propionicus (Buchanan and Pine) comb. nov.

Propionibacterium propionicus (pro.pi.o´ni.cus. M. L. n. acidum propionicum, propionic acid; M. L. neut. adj. propionicus, pertaining to propionic acid). The full description of the species is as given in Bergey’s Manual of Systematic Bacteriology (16). The type strain is strain ATCC 14157 (= DSM 43307).
